description: Try our easy to follow Lentil & Beetroot Salad With Steak recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lentil salad,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Father's Day,High protein,High fibre,Kale,Spinach,Beetroot
name: Lentil & Beetroot Salad With Steak Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 oranges, peeled, thinly sliced into rounds
3 sprig parsley, leaves picked, roughly chopped
1 lemon, juiced and zest finely grated
250g pickled whole baby beetroot, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large frying pan over high heat. Spray steaks with oil and season. Cook for 3-4 minutes, turning once, for medium rare, or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate, cover loosely with foil and rest for 5 minutes. Thinly slice.
Meanwhile, for the dressing, whisk horseradish cream, sour cream, lemon and honey together in a small bowl. Season.
Toss salad mix and dressing together in a bowl. Arrange on plates with lentils, beetroot, orange slices, steak, onion and parsley.
